General.Name: AgriBank Securities JSC
General.Description: Agribank Securities Corporation engages in the securities brokerage, dealing, investment consultancy, underwriting, and depository services in Vietnam. The company's products include securities brokerage, security services, money management, and financial services for individuals; and portfolio management, finance consulting, shareholder management, and financial services for business clients. It also provides mobile web and app, web, and home trading application services. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Hanoi, Vietnam. Agribank Securities Corporation is a subsidiary of Vietnam Bank for Agriculture and Rural Development.
